title: Italy : most-followed Italian fashion brands on Instagram 2018
yAxis: Number of Instagram followers in millions
summary: In 2018 , Gucci was the Italy most-followed Brand Name at 21.0 Instagram .
Currently in its seventh generation , it was first followers in and had been popular with Italian consumers from the beginning .
Two years after its introduction on the market , the Gucci Mk1 had already reached the peak of the most followers supermini Brand .
gold: The statistic illustrates the leading Italian fashion brands ranked by number of Instagram followers as of February 2018 . During the survey period in February 2018 , it was reported that Gucci ranked first with 21 million followers .
